snippet.title: Sneaky Ninja - GDC 2016 Trailer (PC/Wii U)
snippet.description:
Sneaky Ninja is the stealth game Nintendo would make! It's a mix of Mario and Mark of the Ninja, featuring the lighthearted platforming fun of Mario and the strategic stealth action of Mark of the Ninja.

Sneaky Ninja is planned to release for PC and Wii U in Spring 2016!
